effect.scarlet_violet: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.
